Title: Buffalo Rider
Actors: Lily Bhusadhit-a-nan, Tuchapong Rugtawatr, Chinnaphat Kitchaivaranggoon, Phanida Suwansaad
Plot: A rebellious Thai-American girl, sent to live with relatives in rural Thailand, clashes with an entire village when she befriends a mute peasant boy and inspires him to compete in the annual buffalo race.
